Class UFDataChangedEventArgs

Namespace
UltraForce.Library.NetStandard.Events
Assembly
UltraForce.Library.NetStandard.dll

Represents the base class for classes that contain event data, and provides a value to use for events that do not include event data.

public class UFDataChangedEventArgs : EventArgs

Properties

DataChangedToken

This value contains a copy of the DataChangedToken value before it was adjusted when firing this event.

public int DataChangedToken { get; }
